strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday! Here are some things going on in NWA this weekend:

  • Evergreen: Stop by and see the Christmas tree destined for the US Capitol.
  • Culture: Spend an afternoon visiting the Dia de Muertos Exhibition is at the Shiloh Museum.
  • Series: The first of four bike races is on Saturday in Fayetteville, and you could join in the fun!
  • Roll: Do you have a skateboard? There will be a Skateboard Jam at the Shiloh Square on Sunday.
  • Fiddles: It is the 74th annual Original Ozark Folk Festival in Eureka Springs.
  • Celebration: Crystal Bridges will be busy this weekend celebrating its 10 year anniversary.
  • Picture show: Fayetteville Film Festival in Fayetteville today and tomorrow in person and virtual.
  • Tunes: Find yourself a nice place to dine, relax, and listen to live music.

We'll see you Monday, friends. Bye for now!
